title: I recieve lvl 3 honor i got the badge, but i don't got the capsule

replies.body: Honor Capsules have a chance to drop instead of key fragments once you hit Honor Rank 3! It's not a guaranteed item, but each time you get a key frag you have a chance of getting a capsule instead, which will contain some skin shards and 2 key frags!
I got my capsule 2 days after I hit Honor Level 3. Just wait a few days, you'll get it.
The capsule is a random drop, hitting lvl 3 honor unlocks the opportunity for them to drop but its not something you get as soon as you level up
